title: Distributed solar in Pakistan undercounted in official data, could replace billions in fossil fuel imports
description: Think-tank Renewables First finds household, farm, and business solar reshaping energy system and improving economic resilienceThe post Distributed solar in Pakistan undercounted in official data, could replace billions in fossil fuel imports appeared first on Profit by Pakistan Today.

title: Nevada boy finds turtle fossil in Wyoming, helps clean it up for presentation
description: Touren Pope, an A-plus science student at home in Elko, Nev., discovered the 50-million-year-old specimen while visiting his grandparents near Lander.

title: Oklahoma Voice: Energy secretary calls for more emphasis on fossil fuels to keep power on in winter storms
description: A focus on addressing climate change, including by producing wind and solar energy, has not helped Americans keep their electricity and heat on during winter storms, U.S. Energy Secretary Chris Wright said Friday.
